TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1,T2> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`2<T1, T2> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable
generic <typename T1, typename T2> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable
type Tuple<'T1, 'T2> = class interface IStructuralEquatable interface IStructuralComparable interface IComparable

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: Tuple 第 1 個元件的型別。

span.span: The type of the tuple's first component.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: Tuple 第 2 個元件的型別。

span.span: The type of the tuple's second component.
Represents a 2-tuple, or pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tuple 是具有特定數量和值序列的資料結構。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 類別代表 2-tuple 或雙重，也就是 tuple，其中包含兩個元件。The class represents a 2-tuple, or pair, which is a tuple that has two components. 2 tuple 是類似於結構。A 2-tuple is similar to a structure. 您可以具現化藉由呼叫物件建構函式或靜態方法。You can instantiate a object by calling either the constructor or the static method. 您可以擷取值的 tuple 的元件所使用的唯讀和執行個體屬性。You can retrieve the values of the tuple's components by using the read-only and instance properties. Tuple 常用於四種不同方式：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 代表單一的資料集。To represent a single set of data. 例如，tuple 可以表示在資料庫中，記錄，其元件來表示記錄的欄位。For example, a tuple can represent a record in a database, and its components can represent that record's fields. - 提供讓您輕鬆存取、 和操作的資料集。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下列範例會定義陣列所包含的學生，而且其對應名稱的物件測試分數。The following example defines an array of objects that contain the names of students and their corresponding test scores. 然後它會逐一來計算平均值的測試準則陣列。It then iterates the array to calculate the mean test score. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`2.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`2.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`2.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`2.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 若要傳回多個值的方法，而不會使用從`out`參數 （在 C#) 或`ByRef`參數 （在 Visual Basic)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如，下列範例會使用物件來傳回商數及所產生的整數除法的餘數。For example, the following example uses a object to return the quotient and the remainder that result from integer division. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`2.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`2.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`2.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`2.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)] - 若要將多個值傳遞至方法，以透過單一參數。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如，方法具有單一參數，可讓您提供一個執行緒啟動時執行之方法的值。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果您提供物件做為方法引數中，您可以提供兩個項目之資料的執行緒啟動常式。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with two items of data.

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`參數會被視為等於目前的執行個體，在下列情況下：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是物件。It is a object. - 其兩個元件是與目前的執行個體相同的類型。Its two components are of the same types as the current instance. - 其兩個元件的目前執行個體相等。Its two components are equal to those of the current instance. 是否相等由每個元件的預設物件相等比較子決定。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法，以判斷是否有任何的陣列中的物件另一台的物件相等。The following example calls the method to determine whether any of the objects in an array of objects are equal to one another. 輸出會反映出事實，方法會傳回`true`比較時元件具有相等值的物件。The output reflects the fact that the method returns `true` when comparing objects whose components have equal values. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`2.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`2.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`2.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`2.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以動態決定的型別元件中有兩種：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 藉由呼叫`GetType`方法所傳回的值屬性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 藉由擷取物件，代表物件，並擷取第一個項目所傳回的陣列從其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 此範例說明如何使用和屬性，以定義 2 個 tuple 形式，傳回多個值的方法。The example illustrates the use of the and properties to define a method that returns multiple values in the form of a 2-tuple. MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前執行個體比較的物件。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供自訂規則進行比較的物件。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比較子將目前的 物件和指定的物件進行比較，並且傳回一個整數，表示目前的物件在排序順序中位於指定之物件的前面、後面還是相的位置。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer, and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 帶正負號的整數，可指出此執行個體以及排序次序中 的相對位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

item.description: 這個執行個體位於 之前。
這個執行個體和 的排序位置相同。
這個執行個體位於 之後。
This instance and have the same position in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 雖然可以直接呼叫這個方法，但是最常呼叫此方法集合排序方法，包含了參數來排序成員集合，例如，由呼叫方法和方法具現化所使用的物件建構函式。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection., For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法僅供用於排序作業。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 此外，它不應該使用時比較的主要目的是要判斷兩個物件是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要判斷兩個物件是否相等，請呼叫方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的陣列學生的名稱所組成，且測試分數的物件。The following example creates an array of objects that consist of a student's name and test score. 它會顯示未排序的順序陣列中的每個 tuple 的元件，來排序陣列，然後呼叫以排序順序顯示每個 tuple 的值。It displays the component of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display the value of each tuple in sorted order. 若要排序的陣列，此範例會定義泛型`ScoreComparer`類別可實作介面和排序依其第二個元件，而不是其第一個元件的值的遞增順序物件。To sort the array, the example defines a generic `ScoreComparer` class that implements the interface and sorts the objects in ascending order by the value of their second component rather than their first component. 請注意，此範例不會直接呼叫方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 這個方法會隱含地呼叫陣列中每個項目的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`2.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`2.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`2.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`2.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: is not a object.

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 才呼叫實作`other`不`null`，而且如果它可以是成功轉換 （C# 中） 或 （在 Visual Basic) 轉換成其元件是相同的類型與目前的執行個體的物件。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法的第一個階段值要比較的物件實作。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果這個方法呼叫傳回`true`，方法是呼叫一次，並傳遞兩個值物件。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Item2Comparer`類別可實作介面，並變更的方式評估物件是否相等。The following example defines an `Item2Comparer` class that implements the interface and changes the way in which objects are evaluated for equality. 方法永遠都會傳回`true`傳遞時屬性值的兩個物件，並且呼叫方法，評估其屬性值。The method always returns `true` when it is passed the property values of two objects, and it calls the method to evaluate their property values. 如此一來，方法會測試是否相等的值只根據屬性。As a result, the method tests for equality based only on the value of the property. 輸出說明結果的資料集記錄的說明和執行的距離名稱的物件。The output illustrates the result for a data set of objects that record the names of runners and the distances that they ran. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`2.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`2.equals/cs/equals2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`2.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`2.equals/vb/equals2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只會包裝呼叫`comparer`物件的實作。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用來計算雜湊程式碼的演算法應該會傳回相同的雜湊程式碼，其中兩個會被視為相等的物件。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

span.span: The string representation of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的字串形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*)，其中*Item1*和*Item2*代表的值和屬性。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*), where *Item1* and *Item2* represent the values of the and properties. 如果其中一個屬性值是`null`，則會呈現為。If either property value is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下列範例說明方法。The following example illustrates the method. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`2.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`2.tostring/cs/tostring1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`2.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`2.tostring/vb/tostring1.vb#1)]
